lexUnit.definition: COD: stand or meet face to face with hostile intent.

The enemy confronting our society falls in three categories : 1- Hostile intelligence organizations , such as the United States , Saudi Arabia , Egypt , Pakistan and the Jews 2- The straying group who are atheists and apostates 3- The existing environment .
External : All actions and methods adopted to confront dangers from outside .
Internal : All actions and methods adopted to confront dangers from within .
Spying : Confronting infiltration operations carried out by spying agents or moles .
